item.title: 关税担忧加剧，股市将下跌
中国国有汽车制造商合并报告发布后股价上涨
item.description: 有报道称，在市场面临挑战的情况下，中国政府正计划对汽车行业进行兼并和重组，随后中国国有汽车制造商的股票纷纷上涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese state-owned carmakers rose after a report that the government is planning mergers and restructuring in the sector amid challenges for the market.】

item.title: EQT 财团提出以 45 亿美元收购 Fortnox
item.description: 包括 EQT AB 管理的一家基金在内的一个财团提出收购瑞典金融服务公司 Fortnox AB，交易价值为 445 亿克朗（45 亿美元）。【原文：A consortium including a fund managed by EQT AB has offered to buy Swedish financial services firm Fortnox AB in a deal valued at 44.5 billion kronor ($4.5 billion).】

item.title: 小心三月底...否则将失去您的企业
item.description:
这是一出莎士比亚式的悲剧，所以请允许我们引用几句无法抗拒的名言。【原文：

It’s a Shakespearean tragedy of a quarter, so indulge us in a few irresistible quotes.

】

item.title: 马斯克认为特斯拉是一个 "购买机会"，尽管遭到了 DOGE 的反击
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）承认，作为唐纳德-特朗普总统削减政府规模努力的负责人，他的工作 "让我损失惨重"。【原文：Elon Musk acknowledged that his job as head of President Donald Trump’s effort to cut the size of government is “costing me a lot” when it comes to his other big job, as CEO of Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 韩国的卖空禁令已经结束。全球投资者会蜂拥而至吗？
item.description: 3 月 31 日，全球对冲基金和银行使用的卖空交易策略禁令解除，韩国 1.7 万亿美元的股票市场再次对卖空交易开放。【原文：South Korea’s $1.7 trillion stock market is once again open to short selling, after the ban on the trading tactic used by hedge funds and banks around the world was lifted on March 31.】

item.title: 日本将在新财政年度开始前一天批准预算案
item.description: 日本国会将通过一份经过多次修改的初步预算案，从而减轻首相石破茂在面临一系列国内和外交挑战时所承受的部分压力。【原文：Japan’s parliament is set to pass an initial budget after multiple revisions, easing some of the pressure on Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba as he faces a host of domestic and diplomatic challenges.】

item.title: 中国数据公布后新兴货币保持稳定，美国关税受到关注
item.description: 新兴市场货币在早盘交易中持稳，因为有迹象表明中国经济正在企稳，这抵消了对本周美国将征收下一轮关税的忧虑。【原文：Emerging-market currencies were steady in early trading as signs China’s economy is stabilizing offset angst over the next round of US tariffs due this week.】

item.title: 亿万富翁汽车制造商对关税的指责是错误的
item.description:
讨好、奉承和强迫的努力都无济于事。欧盟需要特朗普的新贸易战略。【原文：

Efforts to cajole, flatter and force have gone nowhere. The EU needs a new Trump trade strategy.

】

item.title: 据说北京华联即将向博宇出售豪华 SKP 商场
item.description: 据知情人士透露，北京华联集团投资控股有限公司（Beijing Hualian Group Investment Holding Co.【原文：Beijing Hualian Group Investment Holding Co. is in talks to sell its business that operates and develops luxury malls in China to Boyu Capital, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 李嘉诚考虑推迟港口交易，长江和记股价下跌
item.description: 长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）的股价创下近两周以来的最大跌幅，此前有消息称，其香港亿万富翁老板李嘉诚正在考虑推迟签署一项有争议的交易，即向包括贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s shares dropped by the most in nearly two weeks following news its Hong Kong billionaire owner Li Ka-shing is considering delaying the signing of a controversial deal to sell his Panama Canal ports to a consortium including BlackRock Inc.】

item.title: 台湾股市在大范围下跌中走向修正
item.description: 周一，台湾股市因关税引发的大跌而遭受重创，其基准指数有望从近期高点下跌超过 10%，交易商称之为技术性修正。【原文：Taiwan’s battered stock market got caught up in a tariff-fueled selloff on Monday, putting its benchmark on track to close more than 10% down from a recent high — what traders call a technical correction.】

item.title: 淡马锡和 GIC 据称将在与 TPG 的交易中购买 Novotech 股份
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）和新加坡政府投资有限公司（GIC Pte Ltd）将收购 Novotech 私人有限公司的大量股份，以促进这家临床研究与测试提供商的发展并加快收购步伐，该公司的估值约为 30 亿澳元（19 亿美元）。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte and GIC Pte Ltd. will acquire a significant stake in Novotech Pty Ltd. to fuel growth and accelerate acquisitions for the clinical research and testing provider, valuing the company at about A$3 billion ($1.9 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 马斯克的 XAI 交易为 X 投资者带来意外收获
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克刚刚在三年内第二次收购了社交网络 Twitter 的前身。【原文：Elon Musk just acquired the social network formerly known as Twitter for the second time in three years.】

item.title: 泰国地震后市场重新开放，向投资者作出保证
item.description: 周五发生的大地震造成建筑物大面积损坏，并导致约 18 人死亡，泰国当局在证券交易所准备恢复交易时，努力安抚投资者的情绪。【原文：Thai authorities sought to calm investor nerves as the stock exchange prepared to resume trading after a massive earthquake on Friday caused widespread damage to buildings and killed about 18 people.】

item.title: 中国的 Manus 将其人工智能代理变成 39 美元的订阅服务
item.description: 最近发布的 Manus 人工智能代理正在成为一项订阅服务，这标志着它在与 DeepSeek 进行比较后，正在快速走向商业化。【原文：The recently released Manus artificial intelligence agent is becoming a subscription service, marking a rapid pace to commercialization after it drew comparisons to DeepSeek.】

item.title: 华润燃气削减股息后创下一年来最大跌幅
item.description: 华润燃气集团有限公司（China Resources Gas Group Ltd.）的股价创下一年来最大跌幅，此前该公司的盈利未达预期，并宣布将下调股息。【原文：China Resources Gas Group Ltd.’s shares fell the most in a year after the utility missed earnings estimates and announced it would lower its dividend.】

item.title: 日本为芯片初创企业 Rapidus 再拨 54 亿美元专款
item.description: 日本正准备为芯片初创公司 Rapidus Corp. 提供高达 8025 亿日元（54 亿美元）的额外援助，此举反映出东京在中美紧张局势加剧之际确保半导体供应的决心与日俱增。【原文：Japan is preparing as much as ¥802.5 billion ($5.4 billion) in additional aid for chip startup Rapidus Corp., a move that reflects Tokyo’s growing resolve to secure semiconductor supplies during a time of heightened US-China tensions.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动在特朗普关税预期出台前扩大
item.description: 3 月份，中国的工厂活动继续扩大，这对世界第二大经济体来说是个好消息，因为预计美国将征收关税，这可能会使贸易关系进一步紧张。【原文：China’s factory activity continued to expand in March, welcome news for the world’s No. 2 economy before expected US tariffs that could further strain trade ties.】

item.title: 美国关税担忧打击出口股，日本股市大跌
item.description: 由于对全球贸易战的担忧导致出口相关股票下滑，日本股市暴跌，日经股指有望创下 2020 年 3 月以来的最差季度。【原文：Japanese shares plunged, putting the Nikkei stock gauge on track for its worst quarter since March 2020, as export-related stocks slid on concerns about the global trade war.】

item.title: 中国第二大钢铁制造商年亏损近 10 亿美元
item.description: 鞍钢股份有限公司是中国第二大钢铁制造商的上市子公司，去年亏损近 10 亿美元，凸显了需求萎缩、价格暴跌的行业困境。【原文：Angang Steel Co Ltd., the listed arm of China’s second-biggest steelmaker, racked up a loss of nearly $1 billion last year, underscoring torrid conditions in the industry as demand shrinks and prices plunge.】

item.title: 聊天机器人聚合商 Wrtn 在最新的韩国人工智能交易中获得融资
item.description: Wrtn Technologies Inc.从包括 Goodwater Capital 在内的投资者那里筹集到了 830 亿韩元（约合 5600 万美元）的资金，这是在后 ChatGPT 时代获得融资的越来越多的韩国人工智能初创企业之一。【原文：Wrtn Technologies Inc. has raised 83 billion won ($56 million) from investors including Goodwater Capital, one of a growing number of South Korean AI startups to score financing in the post-ChatGPT era.】

item.title: 特朗普称将对所有国家征收互惠关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他计划开始对 "所有国家 "征收互惠关税，从而平息了人们对他可能会限制将于 4 月 2 日公布的初步关税范围的猜测。【原文：President Donald Trump said he plans to start his reciprocal tariff push with “all countries,” tamping down speculation that he could limit the initial scope of tariffs set to be unveiled April 2.】

item.title: 虫害和鼠害担忧继续拖累 Zensho 股票下跌
item.description: 日本连锁餐厅运营商 Zensho Holdings Co. 的股价下跌达 6.5%，此前该公司表示，在发生多起食品污染事件后，将暂时关闭大部分 Sukiya 门店。【原文：Shares of Zensho Holdings Co. fall as much as 6.5% after the operator of Japanese restaurant chains said it will temporarily close most of its Sukiya stores following multiple food contamination incidents.】

item.title: 韩国股市低开，长达数月的卖空禁令解除
item.description: 韩国股市周一下跌，原因是人们担心美国即将征收关税，以及长达 17 个月的卖空禁令被取消，预计这将引发短期波动。【原文：South Korean stocks declined on Monday, hurt by concerns over looming US tariffs and the removal of a 17-month long ban on short selling that is expected to trigger near-term volatility.】

item.title: 亚洲准备迎接特朗普关税对出口模式的历史性考验
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的对等关税给亚洲带来了一代人的挑战，亚洲领导人面临着艰难的抉择，该地区的经济是围绕对美出口和低贸易壁垒世界而建立的。【原文：Asian leaders face tough decisions as President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs pose a generational challenge to a region whose economies were built around exports to the US and a world of low trade barriers.】

item.title: 美国新关税出台前日本产量创 11 个月最大增幅
item.description: 日本的工业生产创下了近一年来的最快增速，原因是制造商力图在美国对汽车和汽车零部件实施新关税之前满足强劲的需求。【原文：Japan’s industrial production grew at the fastest clip in nearly a year, as manufacturers sought to meet strong demand before the US implements new tariffs on autos and auto parts.】

item.title: 高盛认为美联储今年将采取更多削减措施，因为关税削弱了美国经济增长
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. economists now expect the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates three times this year as President Donald Trump’s tariffs weigh on economic growth and drive up unemployment.】

item.title: 比索涨势因菲律宾国际收支赤字而减弱
item.description: 在菲律宾中央银行将其对国家国际收支的预测从盈余调整为赤字后，菲律宾比索的涨势可能会耗尽。【原文：The Philippine peso’s rally may run out of steam after the central bank revised its projection for the nation’s balance of payments to a deficit from a surplus.】

item.title: 日本央行加息颠覆市场，日本面临全球最大债券损失
item.description: 在日本央行去年转向加息引发全球债市最大损失之后，投资者正在重新考虑他们对日本主权债券的投资策略。【原文：Investors are rethinking their strategies for Japanese sovereign bonds after the Bank of Japan’s pivot to interest-rate hikes in the past year triggered the biggest losses among global debt markets.】
